files.patch: @@ -1,3 +1,30 @@ + +# 10.1.0-next.8 (2020-08-24) + + + + +# 10.1.0-next.8 (2020-08-24) + + +### Bug Fixes + +* **localize:** extract the correct message ids ([#38498](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/38498)) ([ac461e1](https://github.com/angular/angular/commit/ac461e1)) +* **router:** support lazy loading for empty path named outlets ([#38379](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/38379)) ([7ad3264](https://github.com/angular/angular/commit/7ad3264)), closes [#12842](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/12842) + + +### Features + +* **compiler:** support unary operators for more accurate type checking ([#37918](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/37918)) ([874792d](https://github.com/angular/angular/commit/874792d)), closes [#20845](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/20845) [#36178](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/36178) +* **compiler-cli:** add support for TypeScript 4.0 ([#38076](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/38076)) ([0fc44e0](https://github.com/angular/angular/commit/0fc44e0)) + + +### Performance Improvements + +* **forms:** use internal `ngDevMode` flag to tree-shake error messages in prod builds ([#37821](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/37821)) ([201a546](https://github.com/angular/angular/commit/201a546)), closes [#37697](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/37697) + + + ## 10.0.12 (2020-08-24)
